```{r, echo = FALSE}
mon <- as.Date("2020-09-14")

advdate <- function(obj, adv) {
 tmon <- obj + 7*(adv-1)
 tfri <- obj + 4 + 7*(adv-1)
 tmon <- format(tmon, format="%d/%m")
 tfri <- format(tfri, format="%d/%m")
 zadv <- sprintf("%02d", adv)
 tmp <- paste("Week ",zadv,sep=''," (", tmon," - ",tfri, ")")
 return(tmp)
}
```
